name: social-media-app
description: TargetGrid Assignment Social Media App with connection paths

scripts.install: npm install --save-dev concurrently && cd app && echo "Installing app dependencies" && npm install && cd .. && cd server && echo "Installing server dependencies" && npm install && cd ..
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd app && npm run dev" "cd server && npm run dev"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd app && npm run build" "cd server && npm run build"
